data.message: Test MCP reliability fixes comprehensively: All 5 test categories passed: heartbeat (0.01ms latency), concurrency (4 parallel calls via semaphore), embedding ops (semantic search + proactive recall), file logging (rotating at ~/.duro/logs/mcp_server.log), stress test (4 simultaneous queries + health check). Server stable and responsive.
